channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Snippets Library
item.description:
Snippets Library

A secure, lightning-fast code snippet manager to store, organize, and share your code with beautiful syntax highlighting.
May be a good alternative to ByteStash. The problem is there’s no easy docker install method.
item.content:encoded:
Snippets Library

A secure, lightning-fast code snippet manager to store, organize, and share your code with beautiful syntax highlighting.
May be a good alternative to ByteStash. The problem is there’s no easy docker install method.

item.title: PicPeak
item.description:
PicPeak

Self-hosted photo sharing platform for photographers & events. Open-source alternative to PicDrop/Scrapbook with time-limited galleries, password protection, custom branding & no monthly fees. Built with React + Node.js
I wonder if this is a good alternative to WeddingShare?
item.content:encoded:
PicPeak

Self-hosted photo sharing platform for photographers & events. Open-source alternative to PicDrop/Scrapbook with time-limited galleries, password protection, custom branding & no monthly fees. Built with React + Node.js
I wonder if this is a good alternative to WeddingShare?

item.title: Expense Owl
item.description:
Expense Owl

Extremely simple, self-hosted expense tracker with a beautiful UI.

My wish for a personal finance app:

  • Auto-categorization of transactions
  • Great UI, especially for mobile
  • Rest API
item.content:encoded:
Expense Owl

Extremely simple, self-hosted expense tracker with a beautiful UI.

My wish for a personal finance app:

  • Auto-categorization of transactions
  • Great UI, especially for mobile
  • Rest API

item.title: PersonalAccounter
item.description:
PersonalAccounter

A Easy To use & Deploy comprehensive PHP-based personal and small corporate accounting management system with powerful expense tracking, subscription management, and reporting capabilities.
item.content:encoded:
PersonalAccounter

A Easy To use & Deploy comprehensive PHP-based personal and small corporate accounting management system with powerful expense tracking, subscription management, and reporting capabilities.

item.title: EZ Book Keeping
item.description:
EZ Book Keeping

A lightweight, self-hosted personal finance app with a sleek, user-friendly interface and powerful bookkeeping features.
Browsed through the interface, and it’s good actually. Might prove to be a good alternative to Actual Budget. And it has a built-in rest API to get our data.
item.content:encoded:
EZ Book Keeping

A lightweight, self-hosted personal finance app with a sleek, user-friendly interface and powerful bookkeeping features.
Browsed through the interface, and it’s good actually. Might prove to be a good alternative to Actual Budget. And it has a built-in rest API to get our data.

item.title: Simple Datatables
item.description:
Simple Datatables

DataTables but in TypeScript transpiled to Vanilla JS
The simpler alternative to Tabulator.info
item.content:encoded:
Simple Datatables

DataTables but in TypeScript transpiled to Vanilla JS
The simpler alternative to Tabulator.info

item.title: doonfrs/rsync-backup
item.description:
doonfrs/rsync-backup

A simple bash script for automated backups using rsync with configurable sources and excludes.
item.content:encoded:
doonfrs/rsync-backup

A simple bash script for automated backups using rsync with configurable sources and excludes.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K0A0XQXKZV3VM07VBR1M1AKZ
item.description: So you still use Google Search? You should already be using #Searxng for a change!
item.content:encoded: So you still use Google Search? You should already be using #Searxng for a change!

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K0A0HQD1P6H7AB2CXA2QVF1Q
item.description:
What’s new on DeutsFLIX

The Unholy Trinity (2025)

Set against the turbulent backdrop of 1870s Montana, in the moments before the execution of Isaac Broadway, he gives his estranged son, Henry, an impossible task: murder the man who framed him for a crime he didn’t commit. Intent on fulfilling his promise, Henry travels to the remote town of Trinity, where an unexpected turn of events traps him in town and leaves him caught between Gabriel Dove, the town’s upstanding new sheriff, and a mysterious figure named St. Christopher.
item.content:encoded:
What’s new on DeutsFLIX

The Unholy Trinity (2025)

Set against the turbulent backdrop of 1870s Montana, in the moments before the execution of Isaac Broadway, he gives his estranged son, Henry, an impossible task: murder the man who framed him for a crime he didn’t commit. Intent on fulfilling his promise, Henry travels to the remote town of Trinity, where an unexpected turn of events traps him in town and leaves him caught between Gabriel Dove, the town’s upstanding new sheriff, and a mysterious figure named St. Christopher.

Genres: Western, Adventure, Crime

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K0A053C58E0SZ97DJV25Q9E0
item.description: @hongster I use it in several of my VPSs and VMs. Good thing about it compared to Duplicati is metadata is saved together with your backup. It also does incremental backups so you won’t necessarily use up huge backup storage. Finally, it encrypts your backups automatically before it sends to the external repository. I usually use Backblaze as my repository.
item.content:encoded: @hongster I use it in several of my VPSs and VMs. Good thing about it compared to Duplicati is metadata is saved together with your backup. It also does incremental backups so you won’t necessarily use up huge backup storage. Finally, it encrypts your backups automatically before it sends to the external repository. I usually use Backblaze as my repository.
